about.name: Ankit Mawle
about.title: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Innovator
about.description: Crafting cutting-edge solutions in VLSI, AI/ML, Web3, and Cloud Technologies. Transforming ideas into reality with code that matters.
bio: I'm a versatile full-stack developer with a passion for cutting-edge technologies. My expertise spans from VLSI system design to modern web technologies, AI/ML, and blockchain development.
I've developed the VSDIAT LMS for VLSI System Design and worked on various projects involving CAD/CAM software, cloud technologies, and innovative web applications.

projects.title: VSDIAT LMS
projects.description: Comprehensive Learning Management System for VLSI System Design education, featuring interactive modules, progress tracking, and advanced assessment tools.

projects.title: Dhimath Platform
projects.description: Advanced mathematical computing platform with AI-powered problem solving, interactive visualizations, and collaborative learning features.

projects.title: CAD/CAM Integration Suite
projects.description: Integrated CAD/CAM software solutions for manufacturing automation, featuring real-time collaboration and advanced simulation capabilities.

projects.title: Smart IoT Analytics
projects.description: Real-time IoT data analytics platform with machine learning insights, predictive maintenance, and intelligent automation features.

projects.title: DeFi Analytics DApp
projects.description: Decentralized application for DeFi portfolio tracking and analytics, with smart contract integration and cross-chain compatibility.

projects.title: Serverless Cloud Architecture
projects.description: Scalable serverless architecture using Cloudflare Workers, with edge computing capabilities and global content delivery.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Leading the development of VSDIAT LMS, implementing advanced learning analytics, and creating interactive VLSI design simulation tools.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed CAD/CAM integration solutions, implemented IoT data pipelines, and created machine learning models for predictive analytics.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Built responsive web applications, implemented modern JavaScript frameworks, and optimized performance for large-scale applications.
